sentences.en: a computerized system for compiling the weekly charts of record sales
sentences.cn: 编制每周唱片销售榜的计算机化系统

sentences.en: a scheme to computerize the library service
sentences.cn: 使图书馆服务计算机化的方案

sentences.en: Many hospitals say they simply can't afford to computerize.
sentences.cn: 很多医院说他们根本没资金实现计算机化。

sentences.en: The firm decided to computerize its wages department.
sentences.cn: 公司决定用电脑管理发薪部门的工作.

sentences.en: The firm has decided to computerize its wages department.
sentences.cn: 公司已决定在工资科实行电脑操作.

sentences.en: With on the job training the workers train on the new computerize machines.
sentences.cn: 在职训练是在电脑化设备前训练职工.

sentences.en: You are going to computerize the entire production line?
sentences.cn: 你是说将生产线设备电脑化?

trans.tran_cn: 使计算机化，用计算机储存
使计算机化； 用计算机做； 用计算机储存
trans.tran_en: to use a computer to control the way something is done, to store information etc
